issues.description: The constructor for ExcellenceLand in the solution includes an extra String name parameter that does not correspond to any attribute in the UML diagram or problem tasks and does not follow the specified parameter order. According to the UML and task description, the constructor should take (double excellencyLevel, boolean excellentEnough, List<Ride> rides).
issues.suggested_fix:
Remove the extra name parameter and define the ExcellenceLand constructor as:
public ExcellenceLand(double excellencyLevel, boolean excellentEnough, List<Ride> rides) { ... }
